metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4380 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: A logic flaw exists in Ansible. Whenever a private project is created withincorrect credentials, they are logged in plaintext. This flaw allows anattacker to retrieve the credentials from the log, resulting in the loss ofconfidentiality, integrity, and availability.

criterions.comment: ansible package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
ansible-core package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
